H0.text: In which country will you find the Kremesta Dam. Greece

H1.text: In which country will you find the Kremesta Dam. Turkey

H2.text: In which country will you find the Kremesta Dam. Bulgaria

H3.text: In which country will you find the Kremesta Dam. El√°s

A4.text: The Kremasta Dam is an earth-fill embankment dam on the Achelous River in Aetolia-Acarnania, Greece.

A5.text: Lake Kremasta is the largest artificial lake in Greece.
